# Copilot instructions

## Repo overview
- This repo currently contains a single documentation file: [README.md](README.md). Treat it as the source of truth for course information.
- Content is in Spanish and uses Markdown headings and lists. Preserve the existing tone and structure.
- El tono de escritura es formal, como si fueras un académico versado, no analfabeta, que sabe comunicarse, expresarse. No uses adjetivos innecesarios.
- El lenguaje debe ser técnico. Evita usar frases como "Cómputo preciso", más bien escribe "Cálculo por operaciones matriciales"
- Evita dar tu opinion. Presenta los hechos tal cual son
- The is an university course is about signal processing, based on python and electronics. The author is trying to translate existing matlab scripts to python.

## General instructions
- Do not invent. If you dont understand or know something, ask for clarification.
- Do not generate code untill explicitly asked.
